description.problem: Generic product landing pages fail to capture user attention and high-ticket conversion rates in competitive markets.
description.solution: Developed a high-fidelity 3D product showcase using Three.js and Framer Motion, resulting in a 40% increase in user session duration and brand prestige.

description.problem: Healthcare providers struggled with fragmented supply chains and lack of real-time inventory visibility for critical safety equipment.
description.solution: Built a robust ERP-integrated platform allowing hospitals to manage PPE supplies, track shipments, and automate restocking workflows via a Node/Express backend.

description.problem: A legacy brand required a modern digital storefront that maintained high performance while allowing non-technical staff to manage content.
description.solution: Architected a custom headless WordPress solution with WooCommerce integration, optimizing the checkout flow for a 25% conversion lift.
